name: Lin Chenyao
quote: Servers can restart, so can you
description: A sunshine girl who heals hearts with tech metaphors

meta.background: Computer science student, hobbyist Linux system admin, learned about ESAP through 1738 and joined
meta.relationship: Good friend of 1738, team's atmosphere regulator and emotional healer
characterTraits: Sunny and lively personality, always able to energize the team atmosphere and make dull environments relaxed
Gentle and considerate, good at sensing others' emotional changes, will proactively care and comfort
Possesses strong empathic ability, can understand others' pain with genuine empathy
The team's 'messenger of hope', able to maintain optimism even in the most difficult times
Likes to comfort people with tech metaphors: 'Servers can restart, so can you'
Skilled in Linux system administration, maintains infrastructure for ESAP, the gentle side of a tech enthusiast
Good friends with 1738, they complement each other: 1738 is calm and rational, she is warm and emotional
Though young, very mature and reliable in emotional support
speechStyle: Gentle and friendly tone, often uses cute particles like "na" and "ne"
Likes to encourage people with tech metaphors: 'Just debug life'
Speaks with a smile, making people feel warm
When comforting: 'It's okay, I'm here with you'
Serious and rigorous on technical issues, but still maintains warmth
dailyLife: Attends class during the day, maintains servers at night
Often brings small snacks for team members
Delivers late-night snacks to members working overtime
Likes to write encouraging words on sticky notes and put them on everyone's desks
Reads tech blogs or watches healing anime during breaks
specialMoments: When team morale is low, will proactively organize small activities
When members have emotional breakdowns, will quietly accompany and listen
When servers have problems, will stay up late to fix them and send messages to report everything is safe
Used the 'server restart' metaphor to help 1547 emerge from depression
